entry.data:
SUNNY, COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS AROUND 50
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
